channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [Rbx2d/Rbx2a/Rbx2b/Sbg1a/Eri1c/Lim1c][STORAGE] - BSD Servers
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 2, 12:00 - 15:00 UTC

Jan 31, 20:32 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/03/2023 12:00 UTC
End time : 02/03/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : The service will unreachable for approximately 3 hours
Service improvement :As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade Storage Servers BSD

item.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] - vCenter major upgrade and and ESXi upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 27, 07:00 UTC  -  Mar 3, 17:00 UTC

Feb 15, 22:26 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/02/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 03/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will be inaccessible for 1 hour during the maintenance. Hosts will be rebooted, but there is no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers without Zerto service.

item.title: [Global][VMware Private Cloud] - vCenter and ESXi major upgrade

Feb 8, 23:19 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/02/2023 07:00 UTC

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers without Zerto service.
The operation will be done by pool. A communication will be send to inform customers of their specific schedule.

- pcc-004114
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [RBX7][VMwarePrivateCloud] - Datastores unavailable
item.description:
Feb 6, 08:23 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/02/2023 08:02 UTC
End Time : 06/02/2023 08:19 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 6, 08:19 UTC
Update - Further investigation reported those datastores impacted :
ssd-009229
ssd-010041
ssd-009227
ssd-009235
ssd-009226
ssd-009230
ssd-009234
ssd-009580
ssd-009231
ssd-009381

Feb 6, 08:10 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/02/2023 08:02 UTC
Service impact : Datastores on cluster are not available
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Jan 30, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 24, 18:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/01/2023 07:00 UTC 
End time : 03/02/2023 17:00 UTC 
Service impact : vROps unavailable during the upgrade
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade vROps (vRealize Operations) to its last version.
The duration will be one hour per vrom.
Customer can reschedule maintenance.
Customer will be notified by email when the maintenance is scheduled.

item.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Upgrade Storage Equipement
item.description:
Feb 2, 03:36 UTC
Completed - The 5 veeambackup servers are operational.
The backup functionality of these servers will not run on it this night.
The backup functionality of these 5 servers will be operational again the 02/02/2023 from 21h00 UTC.

Feb 1, 23:06 UTC
Update - The maintenance is still ongoing on 5 veeambackup servers. The backup jobs of these servers will not run on it this night. Our teams are working on the resolution of this malfunction.
The server should be operational in the next four hours.
The backup functionality of these 5 servers will be operational again the 02/02/2023 from 21h00 UTC

item.title: [Global][VMware Private Cloud] - vSphere Client login
item.description:
Jan 31, 15:36 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 31, 09:49 UTC
Update - Our teams will perform a final patch implementation and deployment to prevent this from happening again. After these operations, we will be able to close the job completely.

Jan 30, 18:05 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 27/01/2023 13:00 UTC
End time : 30/01/2023 17:11 UTC
Service status: Services are working as they should be.
Ongoing actions : The Pccs Impacted have been fixed.

Jan 30, 14:39 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jan 30, 14:37 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/01/2023 13:00 UTC
Service impact : The vSphere Client login page is returning 500 error preventing login to vSphere.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
Root cause : An incompatible configuration version is being deployed on "SSL gateway" (the machine that acts as a bridge & firewall between your Hosted Private Cloud and the internet and allows you to connect to the vSphere web client among others things).
